channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5325] Costs for Express Delivery are not showing in the sticky cart
item.description:
Case:
add product to cart > register as b2c - > payment and delivery page opens -> Select Emergency -> Emergency should be selected and cost of delivery in sticky cart should change to 22.

it shows the express delivery, but without the amount of it
item.summary: Costs for Express Delivery are not showing in the sticky cart

status.description: Change Request/Bug was approved by customer, CR/Bug can be implemented/fixed

comments.comment:
It seems we got 0.- as Express costs from SAP.
Could you please check the response if this is correct?
If yes they send us the wrong costs.

The webshop part is fixed. However, I noticed that we do not receive the shipping cost from SAP for express delivery (code: X1), see the soap response below:

<SOAP:Envelope xmlns:SOAP='http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/'>
	<SOAP:Header/>
	<SOAP:Body>
		<ns1:OrderCalculationResponse xmlns:ns1='http://www.distrelec.com/hybris'>
			<orderEntries>
				<materialNumber>14022002</materialNumber>
				<orderQuantity>100</orderQuantity>
				<freeGiftPromotion>false</freeGiftPromotion>
				<listPrice>5.67</listPrice>
				<listPriceTotal>567.0</listPriceTotal>
				<actualPrice>5.67</actualPrice>
				<actualPriceTotal>567.0</actualPriceTotal>
				<availabilityInfo>
					<availableQuantity>0</availableQuantity>
					<estimatedDeliveryDate>20141013</estimatedDeliveryDate>
				</availabilityInfo>
			</orderEntries>
			<paymentMethods>
				<code>WB01</code>
				<price>0.0</price>
				<selected>false</selected>
			</paymentMethods>
			<paymentMethods>
				<code>WB02</code>
				<price>0.0</price>
				<selected>false</selected>
			</paymentMethods>
			<paymentMethods>
				<code>WB03</code>
				<price>1.0</price>
				<selected>false</selected>
			</paymentMethods>
			<paymentMethods>
				<code>WB05</code>
				<price>0.0</price>
				<selected>false</selected>
			</paymentMethods>
			<paymentMethods>
				<code>Z017</code>
				<price>0.0</price>
				<selected>true</selected>
			</paymentMethods>
			<shippingMethods>
				<code>A1</code>
				<price>0.0</price>
				<selected>false</selected>
			</shippingMethods>
			<shippingMethods>
				<code>E1</code>
				<price>9.0</price>
				<selected>false</selected>
			</shippingMethods>
			<shippingMethods>
				<code>E2</code>
				<price>0.0</price>
				<selected>false</selected>
			</shippingMethods>
			<shippingMethods>
				<code>N1</code>
				<price>6.95</price>
				<selected>false</selected>
			</shippingMethods>
			<shippingMethods>
				<code>N2</code>
				<price>0.0</price>
				<selected>false</selected>
			</shippingMethods>
			<shippingMethods>
				<code>X1</code>
				<price>0.0</price>
				<selected>true</selected>
			</shippingMethods>
			<subtotal1>567.0</subtotal1>
			<subtotal2>567.0</subtotal2>
			<tax>107.73</tax>
			<total>674.73</total>
		</ns1:OrderCalculationResponse>
	</SOAP:Body>
</SOAP:Envelope>

Note: sometimes we receive the shipping cost and sometimes we do not 

<shippingPrice>6.95</shippingPrice>

.

However, in all cases we always receive zero as X1 price.

<shippingMethods>
	<code>X1</code>
	<price>0.0</price>
	<selected>false</selected>
</shippingMethods>

Hi Evangelos,
Could you please check?

Hello Florian
The condition was deleted from SAP. I have now added a new value of 49Eur

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5358] No cat+ articles searchable
item.description:
Mac OS X 10.9.5
Safari 7.1

http://test.distrelec.de/search?q=411%2F1933IP

Search for an cat+ articel via search bar is not possible, serach via URL --> http://test.distrelec.de/p/90000368 will show the wished article.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5310] Incomplete Add-to-Cart tracking on basket overview page
item.description:
-> FE-task

Test-case to verify/reproduce the issue:

  • Add a product to the basket
  • On the basket overview page click on the '+'-symbol to increase to increase the product-amount from 1 to 2 in the current basket
  • By clicking on the '+'-symbol a webtrekk request is triggered (compare a schematic request attached). The transmission of a parameter is thereby curently missing: 'co' (referring to the productCost-parameter).
    FYI: If you e.g. add a product to the basket on a product detail page the 'co' is properly respectively transmitted as specified.

Please verify and refactor accordingly.

Thx Mark
item.summary: Incomplete Add-to-Cart tracking on basket overview page

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5267] Open Order - Subuser can change privileges in edit function
item.description:
log in as a subuser (open order) -> add product to the cart -> add open order to a existing order -> change date over "Details zu offenen Aufträgen" -> change "Offen für alle Kontakte"

(Sub User can't change priviliges for other users, just admin)

see also print screen
item.summary: Open Order - Subuser can change privileges in edit function

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
in checkout it should not be possible to choose an existing open order for which the current contact doesn't have the edit permission.
For the my-account section there is this ticket to disable the edit buttons DISTRELEC-5369

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4875] Shop ignores FF redirect campaigns when only one product is found
item.description:
The shop does not make a redirect triggered by a FF redirect campaign if the search generates only one result. This prevents me from optimizing "wrong" search results.

Please adjust so that all campaigns are able even with only one product found.

e.g. "Papierkatalog" in CH-DE --> redirect to the catalog order page, which works in FF interface, but not on shop. This term is quite frequently searched for

As discussed with Nabil: Whenever we have a redirect campaign in FF, we redirect. No matter how many products are found. FF redirection rules always apply.
item.summary: Shop ignores FF redirect campaigns when only one product is found

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Daniela,
"Papierkatalog" is working on my side.
Could you please check again?

Hi Florian

It's only working because the term "Papierkatalog" now produces zero results. "Katalog" on the other hand, now newly generates one result, which pops up instead of the redirect.
the FF redirection rule are implemented

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4517] Amend Teaser-Tracking ID for product-listings
item.description:
Currently product-listings can be reached via navigation ([[…]]cat-L3D[[…]] - e.g. http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Automation/Drahtlose-Kommunikation/GPS/c/cat-L3D_525576) and/or a search-query ([[…]]search?q=[[…]] - e.g. http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=GPS-Modul+5.5+V+80). In both cases the implemented Teaser-Tracking ID is adhering to the following syntax: [[tld]].ons.[[art-nr.]].-

Required: The Teaser-Tracking ID shall be different depending on whether the product-listing was reached by navigation or search as following

  • Search-based generated product-listing: [[tld]].faf-s.plg.[[art-nr.]].- (schematic ID-example: ch.faf-s.plg.667682.-)
  • Navigation-based generated product-listing: [[tld]].ons.plg.[[art-nr.]].- (schematic ID-example: ch.ons.plg.667682.-)

Thx Mark

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Mark, will we have any complications regarding SEO with this?

Hi Flo

I pretty sure that this would not lead to any SEO-implications as we would merely change an invisible small part of an ID-string (no content as such).

Bests, Mark
Please estimate

The object "wtTeaserTrackingId" (e.g: "ch.ons") comes from BE:

<c:set var="teasertrackingid" value="$

{wtTeaserTrackingId}

.$

{codeErpRelevant}

.-" />

Shall this ticket impact BE?
BR
Please advise! Thx Mark

Hello Surendra,
could you please modify the variable $

{wtTeaserTrackingId}

accordingly?
Thanks!
Ruben

Hi Surendra,

I assume that regarding (2) you are referring to the content in product detail page sections such as 'Similar Products' and/or 'Accessories'. In this case the sole need is tracking id for product-listing (i.e (1)).

Bests, Mark

Hi Mark,

Sorry, It is not clear to me what you have wrote. could you be precise, please.

Verified and tested today on test.distrelec.ch (v3.0.m15).

I) Test-URL: http://test.distrelec.ch/search?q=usb (compare attached screenshot in this regard - I.png)

> As specified the ID would need to be: ch.faf-s.plg.842866. (instead of ch.ons.842866.-)

II) Test-URL: http://test.distrelec.ch/en/Automation/Motors-Controllers-Actuators/Actuators/c/cat-L3D_525517 (compare attached screenshot in this regard - II.png)

> As specified the ID would need to be: ch.ons.plg.441496. (instead of ch.ons.441496.-)

Please verify and refactor.

Thx Mark

Hi Mark,
It has not been deployed yet. Thats why you cant able to test. I will let u know when it is deployed.

Verified and tested today on test.distrelec.ch (v3.0.m19) -> DONE

Thanks for the effort! Mark

Hi Ruben

As discussed today at Namics, for all (6) rectangle-icons on product-listings (compare attached screenshot in this regard) the Teaser-Tracking ID shall constantly be as following: [[tld]].ons.[[ActivatedEventID]].-

Thx Mark

Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4368] Activate suggest for search ("query" suggest)
item.description:
"Query" suggest needs to be activated in FF.

It helps the customer to come up with a suitable query more easily and it helps us to channel the search terms and to optimize on this basis.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The configuration on FF side is just an activation of a check box, but on shop side this information needs to be parsed an displayed.
So we need some backend changes to populate this information and we need a frontend engineer that handles the display of it.
Backend: 1d - 1.5d
Frontend: ?

Hi Jan,
Is it possible to give an FE estimation for this?

Hi Florian,

I looked at it and here are some thoughts / open questions, which will need to be solved before implementation

  • What color will the hint be? Grey might not be ideal, since the background is black (See Mockup Printscreen)
  • What happens when the user gets a suggestion and clicks on search (i would expect that only the from the user entered part will be searched for)
  • How does the user take the suggested hint? (Tab key?)

My Estimation for the Frontend Part is 2 days.
The estimation is so high, because for the distrelec typeahead, we do NOT use a plugin, but implemented it ourself. Such a hint cannot just be appended to the input field value, because the text in an input field can only have one color. Because of that, I need to create some kine of hidden Element which is behind the text field. Together with the sticky header and all the IE8 testing, it will take quite some time to implement it.

Hi Jan,

  • What color will the hint be? Grey might not be ideal, since the background is black (See Mockup Printscreen)
    • I think grey would work on black after the white font. Can you add an example?
  • What happens when the user gets a suggestion and clicks on search (i would expect that only the from the user entered part will be searched for)
    • Correct.
  • How does the user take the suggested hint? (Tab key?)
    • Correct.
sorry..somehow the screenshot didn't get added before..
approved.
Configuration of FACT Finder required. Thx Husi
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5370] No function at the approval buttons (order detail)
item.description:
Case:
distrelec.testing+17-3@gmail.com
Add product to cart with over 500.- Budget, so that could be approved from manager.

logged in with distrelec.testing+17@gmail.com and tried to approve over my account -> order manager -> approval requests -> order detail -> reject (ts-37.41 test.distrelec.ch) --> nothing happens after clicking on button

Excecption:
you can reject the request (Fly Out opens (Comment Field, cancel button, submit button)
item.summary: No function at the approval buttons (order detail)

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
